name: Puzzled Platypus
description:
I'm a puzzled platypus, and I need your help! Keep me from walking into spikes and lava while you shuffle the world around for high scores! Match a row with me inside for a combo. How long can you keep it going? Once we get the hang of it, we can speed the game up in expert mode. Higher stakes mean higher scores! Let's go!

  • Move the cursor: arrow keys or mouse click
  • Slide tiles: WASD keys or click and drag with the mouse
  • Pause: space

Thanks for playing! Contact  me at @snicklodocus or @nedmakesgames. Watch me make games live on Twitch! Thank you!
